TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {10770=As with other hosts, InMotion also offers website builders, 1-Click CMS installations via Softaculous, and account management tools. InMotion Hosting is definitely worth checking out. Note: If you are planning to run more than 2 MySQL Databases or host multiple domains, you will want to consider the Power or Pro plan. InMotion also offers Dedicated, VPS, Managed and Reseller Hosting to accommodate for your growing online needs. Since 2003 Arvixe has been offering reseller web-hosting services to designers…, 57076=With such a wide variety of hosting options it’s easy to see how Arvixe really is the jack of hosting. Since 2003 Arvixe has been offering reseller web-hosting services to designers, developers and entrepreneurs alike, all across the globe., 30513=(mt) Media Temple has a bit of a higher price point for their service, but one can certainly justify it. They implement their Grid Technology with SSDs, and built-in redundancy. They also measure usage based on GPU cycles vs CPU cycles. This means that you will not get shut down for large or abnormal spikes in traffic. They will just bill for any overages. The allotment of 2000 GPU's should be more than enough for your average business site to not have to worry about overage., 50762=InMotion offers free consultations where you are under no obligation to buy, ultimately helping you make the best educated decision about your next business move. With little comparison in packages you can choose any reseller option and be truly supported and covered through the life of your hosting business. The largest downfall is the top reseller package; the R-3000 is the only option that offers the launch assist. For a one off $99 fee we highly recommend that you take advantage of this add on and go with either the R-1000 or 2000 package. With InMotion’s outstanding 24/7 customer support it’s a clear no brainer.}
textBeforeTable: Disclosure: We receive compensation from the companies whose products we review. We’re independently owned and the opinions expressed here are our own. GoDaddy is powerful hosting made easy and despite what you may have heard about them, they actually do offer user-friendly hosting for managing your business online. You can count on safety, security, and the flexibility to change your hosting needs as your business grows. What makes GoDaddy’s hosting a premier choice is their easy, step-by-step process to help you get set up online. They offer advice on custom websites, managed Wordpress and Virtual Private Servers (VPS), allowing you to get where you need to be at whatever speed best suits you. Whilst GoDaddy offers flexible plans for your business there are some exceptional standard services that come with every package. Free domain with annual plans, free email addresses, 200+ applications, unlimited monthly bandwidth, 1GB storage, MySQL, Linux, and 200MB storage for Windows SQL databases and 24 hour security monitoring and DDoS protection. GoDaddy is the industry behemoth of web hosting. They service upwards of 45 million domain names, have a world class data center and with flexible solutions for various business types, it’s easy to see how GoDaddy has grown to be the leader in hosting solutions. GoDaddy Visit GoDaddy From $1.00 / month
